duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing a variety of hot and cold coffee beverages, focusing on delivering delicious drinks.
Entering and completing customers’ orders on the point-of-sale computer system, accepting various types of payment, and making change.
Maintaining complete knowledge of products and preparation standards, while interacting with guests in a friendly and fast manner.
Performing other duties as directed, including handling food deliveries, cleaning the service area, and replenishing food.
